name: IAE 2950
description: The Intergalactic Aerospace Exposition, or IAE, is the universe’s premier space ship show and convention. Taking place at New Babbage.

name: Ship Showdown 2950
description: From now through September 23rd, we’re pitting the community’s top 16 flyable ships against each other. Check back each day to vote for your favorites and see which one comes out on top.

name: Invictus Week 2950
description: Invictus Launch Week, also  Day and Armistice Day that marks the beginning of the new recruitment year for the UEE Navy.
